DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Multi-National Gilenya Pregnancy Exposure Registry Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) continuously monitor , evaluate , assess major minor teratogenic effect offspring woman expose Gilenya ( 8 week last menstrual period ) pregnancy routine clinical practice . The overall aim collect evaluate data maternal , fetal , infant outcome compare reference population .
